description:
DRCoordinator._calculatePaymentAmount(IDRCoordinatorCallable.PaymentPreFeeType,uint32,uint256,uint96,uint32,FeeType,uint96) (contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#815-845) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- paymentPreFee = (LINK_TO_JUELS_FACTOR * _weiPerUnitGas * (GAS_AFTER_PAYMENT_CALCULATION + _startGas - gasleft()())) / weiPerUnitLink (contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#830-832)
	- paymentAfterFee = paymentPreFee + (paymentPreFee * _fee) / PERMYRIAD (contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#840)
markdown:
[DRCoordinator._calculatePaymentAmount(IDRCoordinatorCallable.PaymentPreFeeType,uint32,uint256,uint96,uint32,FeeType,uint96)](contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#L815-L845) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [paymentPreFee = (LINK_TO_JUELS_FACTOR * _weiPerUnitGas * (GAS_AFTER_PAYMENT_CALCULATION + _startGas - gasleft()())) / weiPerUnitLink](contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#L830-L832)
	- [paymentAfterFee = paymentPreFee + (paymentPreFee * _fee) / PERMYRIAD](contracts/drcoordinator/v0.8/DRCoordinator.sol#L840)
